value:
So many are compelled by war to risk
their lives in defense of their homes.
We must never fail to honor them.

It took a great deal of support from
friends and allies to secure my rule as
queen. I will never forget that.

Difficulty concentrating? Try to focus
on your breathing. That always helps
me feel better.

I took to the battlefield to help my
allies bear the burden of risk, but...
I fear I only caused them more worry.

I was taught how to prepare for battle
by the Radiant Hero himself. I warn
you, I learned his lessons well.

I pray that you will always cherish the
happy and fulfilling friendship you
have with $Nf.

If you are ever in despair, it will be
faith in yourself and your allies that
rekindles the radiant flame of hope.

May the hearts of the people be ever
full of hope's light!

Even in the deepest darkness, always
remember that the dawn will come.

No matter the place or time, I always
find hope and beauty in the rise of
the morning sun.

I am Elincia. I became Crimea's queen
only by necessityâ€”but if my deeds
earn praise, I am honored.

If I'm being entirely honest, I have to
wonder what future generations will
think of our rule in Crimea.$k$pI can say for certain that those of us
involved in rebuilding did everything
we could for a prosperous future.$k$pWe fought and lived alongside our
loved ones with the intent to build
an honest and peaceful society.$k$pIf we were at all successful, and if our
people remember us with any amount
of fondness, then I am satisfied.$k$pThe future is in the hands of those
who come after us. I hope they are
able to live fulfilling lives.$k$pIf I could speak to them now, I would
remind them that there will always be
times of adversity ahead.$k$pBut if they can stand strong and hold
hope in their hearts as the Radiant
Hero did, then they will persevere.
Drive them back!
Stand down!
I will stop you.
For my people!
If I could only...
Please, just call me Elincia. I've done nothing worthy of recognition.
Ah! You always manage to catch me by surprise!
History is not shaped by monarchs, but by the multitudes.
If I have nudged the scales even slightly toward prosperity...then I am gratified.
No matter the age or world, conflict always seems to be brewing. Will we ever see an end to it?
I wonder how history will remember my deeds...
Being near you has a way of putting me at ease.
Let us begin.
Guide me.
Courage.
